roleset.name: abnormally narrow

example.name: Arg 2 rather than arg 4 because this tells the reach (ext) of the stricture but not where it releases its grip
example.text: [She-1] likely is strictured [*-1] for quite a ways beyond just the transverse colon.
example.arg: for quite a ways beyond just the transverse colon.

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to strictureing.01 and constrict.01. Constrict.01 is a member of VN class other_cos-45.4. No FN class. Framed by Katie.
